mapper.select: SELECT MC.ID COMPETENCE_ID, t.ID, t.NAME, t.NAME_PATH, t.CODE, t.ADDRESS, t.FK_PARENT_MENU_ID, mc.CREATE_AT, mc.CREATE_BY, t.MODIFY_AT, t.MODIFY_BY, t.STATE, row_number() over(ORDER BY t.ID) AS NUM_INDEX FROM ( SELECT ID, NAME, CODE, ADDRESS, FK_PARENT_MENU_ID, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_AT, MODIFY_BY, STATE, MIN(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(NAME, '->'), 3)) NAME_PATH FROM SYS_MENU_DATA START WITH 1 = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FK_PARENT_MENU_ID GROUP BY ID,NAME,CODE,ADDRESS,FK_PARENT_MENU_ID,CREATE_AT,CREATE_BY,MODIFY_AT,MODIFY_BY,STATE ) t INNER JOIN SYS_MENU_COMPETENCE MC ON MC.FK_MENU_ID = T.ID WHERE MC.FK_COMPETENCE_CATEGORY_ID = #{C_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (t.NAME LIKE '%' || #{KEY ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR t.CODE LIKE '%' || #{KEY,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
